text: Ijō (ga junrei no sadame)dearu. Arrā no shinsei (na gishiki) o junshu suru mono wa,-nushi no omotode wa mottomo yoi monodearu. Sorekara kachiku wa, anata gata ni yomi kikasa reta mono o nozoki,(junrei-chū no shokuryō to shite) gōhōdearu. Sorede gūzō no yogore kara hanare, kyogi no kotoba o sake nasai
